name: JQ2 - Oxymoron
description:
Made for the 5th GMC jam. Theme: Two sides of the same coin.

Play as Oxy, the recently unleashed magical demon on her quest for freedom.
Also play as the Moron, a super tough soldier with a noble mission.
And then, play both characters at the same time, when there world crumbles and their values disappear.

Red controls:

  • Mouse: move around
  • Left click: shoot

Blue controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys: Move
  • Space bar: jump
  • CTRL or Shift: shoot
  • Hold up or down while shooting to alter your bullet's trajectories.
